name: Core_StringBuffer_getSubString
signature: Core_Result Core_StringBuffer_getSubString(Core_String** RETURN, Core_StringBuffer* SELF, Core_Size start, Core_Size length);

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The index of the UTF-8 symbol at which the substring starts.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The length in UTF-8 symbols of the substring.

success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned a pointer to a @{code('Core_String')} object.
The UTF-8 symbol sequence of that @{code('Core_String')} object is the subsequence of the UTF-8 symbol sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.
The subsequence starts at the symbol @{code('start')} and ends before the symbol @{code('start+length')}.
The caller acquired a reference to that  @{code('Core_String')} object.

errors.errorCondition: @{code('start+length')} is greater than the number of UTF-8 symbols in this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.

description: Get a copy of a subsequence of the UTF-8 symbol sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object as a @{code('Core_String')} object.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
